plays.text: Penalty to Joe Nieuwendyk 2 minutes for High Sticking Justin Williams
Penalty to Dan McGillis 2 minutes for Roughing Jamie Langenbrunner
Penalty to Ruslan Fedotenko 2 minutes for High Sticking Brian Gionta
Goal scored by John Madden assisted by Ken Daneyko
